page.title: 20Farming in our Area.Credits.
page.content:
just over one ton per acre to almost four tons.The number of cows increased from 47 to 77 and the average yield of milk per cow went from 2211 litres to 5844.The price per litre in 1944 was 2.8p and in 1984 15.0p.
{CREDITS Our group consisted of children from Class One,Markyate J.M.I.School, made up of third and fourth year children. The following wrote our pages of text: Ruth Aldridge,David Carter,David Lee, Leanne Hawes,Nicola Penman,Eleanor Mc.Granaghan,Josephine Plant,Donna Abel,Carley-Jo Rackley,Ian Devon, Imogen Martin,Andrea Burchmore,Matthew Rayner,Rowan Aldridge and Tony Hunt. We would also like to acknowledge the help of the Staff,Parents and friends.
